analytic.title: It is Not Right to Call Ourselves Orthodox and the Other Heretics: Ecumenical Attitudes in the Jacobite Church in the Time of the Crusaders

monogr.title: East and West in the Crusader States: Context ‒ Contacts ‒ Confrontations II. Acta of the Congress Held at Hernen Castle in May 1997

body.bibl: Teule, Herman G. B. “It Is Not Right to Call Ourselves Orthodox and the Other Heretics: Ecumenical Attitudes in the Jacobite Church in the Time of the Crusaders.” In East and West in the Crusader States: Context ‒ Contacts ‒ Confrontations II. Acta of the Congress Held at Hernen Castle in May 1997, edited by Krijna Nelly Ciggaar and Herman G. B. Teule, 13–27. Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta 92. Leuven: Peeters, 1999.

Herman G. B. Teule, It Is Not Right to Call Ourselves Orthodox and the Other Heretics: Ecumenical Attitudes in the Jacobite Church in the Time of the Crusaders,” in East and West in the Crusader States: Context ‒ Contacts ‒ Confrontations II.
